page.title: 13OUTDOOR LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Many people in this area own their own horses and/or ponies and are seen riding around the country lanes.Or nearby there are several riding schools. There are several sailing clubs in the area at{Cleethorpes , Grimsby, {Humberston}and{Covenham Reservoir}. Shooting is another common pastime in this area on organised shoots,shooting Pheasants and Partridges or on the saltmarsh shooting wild ducks.People also shoot rabbits,hares,pigeons etc. The village also has it's own Football team and Cricket club. The local canal is sometimes used for canoeing and fishing.
